title: SOLD 1887 Allen and Ginter N28 Adrian C Anson SOLD

posts.post_title: SOLD 1887 Allen and Ginter N28 Adrian C Anson SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD SOLD SOLD
SGC A 1887 N28 A and G Cap Anson
Presents much much nicer, hand cut borders
Looks more like EX except for a small amount of paper loss on back and about 6-7 little indentations on the front.  See photos
Asking $1000 or best offer, paypal friends and family, shipped and insured
Please pm with any questions 
Great card, but need to fund another purchase
Thanks for looking
Eric
